title: ANIMATED SERIES
body: Dear Riot, i saw your Bard:Mountain little clip thingo, and looked at it and thought "WOAH, this would make an awesome anime" so please rito, make an anime about character lore, people will get really into it i can tell, based on the success of the curse of the sad mummy video and the pentakill album and the new league music album i have no doubt in my mind that an anime series about all the leaugues champs would be freaking awesome!, 1 episode per champion is almost 120 episodes, or 4 - 6  seasons of anime, that would be sooooo cool, please read this riot, if you do this i will crii{{item:3070}} tears {{item:3070}} of {{item:3070}} ULTIMATE {{item:3070}} JOY {{item:3070}} PLZ RIOT PLZ {{item:3070}}{{item:3070}}{{item:3070}}
